title: After the development of reservations, any occupants who could not be settled due to non- buildability of required construction area for rehabilitation and relocation, owing to constraints impose by DCR, shall be rehabilitated in the nearby URS or PAP tenements available with the Corporation; as per policy guidelines decided by the Corporation
clause_text: After the development of reservations, any occupants who could not be settled due to non- buildability of required construction area for rehabilitation and relocation, owing to constraints impose by DCR, shall be rehabilitated in the nearby URS or PAP tenements available with the Corporation; as per policy guidelines decided by the Corporation.
